name: nautically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to ships, sailing, or sailors: They ate their dinner at the nautically themed "Fish & Ships". These three new novels are all nautically related. See
nautical
More examplesFewer examplesFishers Bistro is surrounded by other nautically named rivals.He was nautically dressed in a suit of shaggy blue.Coco Chanel is responsible for the vast majority of nautically inspired fashion today.
